ISSUE.TITLE: ListParts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: version:1.90 起了一个seaweedfs的server,当Client端发起一个ListParts的请求时，server可以接收到请求但是不能将响应中的Parts字段 返回给Client #1432 listPartOutputParts [{ ETag: "\"d7e02d037f566a94069d42f3424a5184\"", LastModified: 2020-09-11 07:58:54 +0000 UTC, PartNumber: 1, Size: 5242880 } { ETag: "\"19516d404b818722bdb3534350f50053\"", LastModified: 2020-09-11 07:58:54 +0000 UTC, PartNumber: 2, Size: 5242880 } { ETag: "\"21e6e1deb3b4af85a92b3d4bb5fd190f\"", LastModified: 2020-09-11 07:58:55 +0000 UTC, PartNumber: 3, Size: 5242880 }] 比如这个可以在seaweedfs的Server展示出来但是 Client得不到这个字段的结果

COMMIT.MESSAGE: s3: ListParts output xml format fix https://github.com/chrislusf/seaweedfs/issues/1461
